text: Adam Daghim (born 28 September 2005) is a Danish professional footballer who plays as a winger for Red Bull Salzburg. ==Career== Daghim comes from FC Copenhagen's youth academy. He played there until 2021. He then moved to the youth of the Aarhus GF.tipsbladet.dk There he already played for the U19 and the reserve team in 2021–22. He made his debut in the first team on 3 April 2022 (matchday 23) when he came on as a substitute against Vejle BK. After that game, he got his first professional contract with Aarhus on April 4, 2022.agf.dk He played three times for the professionals in the Superligaen relegation round in the 2021–22 season. After another three appearances at the beginning of the 2023–24 season, Daghim went to the Austrian Bundesliga club FC Red Bull Salzburg in August 2023. He received a contract that ran until 2026. In Salzburg he was loaned to FC Liefering.FC RB Salzburg In February 2024, he was in the Salzburg squad for the first time. In the same month, he made his debut against SK Sturm Graz in the Bundesliga. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Club Season League National cup Europe Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals AGF 2021–22 Danish Superliga 3 0 0 0 – – 3 0 2022–23 3 0 1 0 – – 4 0 2023–24 3 0 0 0 1 0 – 4 0 Total Total 9 0 1 0 1 0 – 11 0 Liefering (loan) 2023–24 Austrian Football Second League 9 4 0 0 – – 9 4 Austrian Football Second League 13 2 0 0 – – 13 2 Total 22 6 0 0 – – 22 6 Red Bull Salzburg 2023–24 Austrian Bundesliga 1 0 0 0 0 0 – 1 0 2024–25 Austrian Bundesliga 5 0 2 1 5 1 0 0 12 2 Total 6 0 2 1 5 1 0 0 13 2 Career total Career total Career total 37 6 3 1 6 1 0 0 46 8 ==References== ==References== Category:2005 births Category:Living people Category:Danish footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:FC Liefering players Category:FC Red Bull Salzburg players
